helpUsTitle: Every contribution brings us closer to fulfilling this dream
helpUsText: You also help us by following us on Instagram, or simply telling a friend about the campaign so that more people know our story.

paymentDescription: Everything counts! Even ARS 50 (around USD 0.5) can go a long way and help all these children have a better place to play the sport they love. Help us make the difference ðŸ¤—
